name: helprealm
description: dnyHelpRealm is a self hosted support ticket and helpdesk system. It lets users submit issues, track statuses and communicate with staff through an intuitive web interface suited for small teams and community projects.

features.title: Ticket Management
features.description: Create, assign, and track support tickets through their entire lifecycle

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Internal notes and comments for staff collaboration on tickets

features.title: User Portal
features.description: Self-service portal where users can submit and track their own tickets

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive notifications and updates via email for ticket activity

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Lightweight system designed for community projects and small teams
